author: jade dragon
text:
literally
the key
to my heart

author: jade dragon
text:
& now
all i want
is to surrender all to you

author: jade dragon
text: you unlocked parts of me that i had gone deaf to screams for freedom

author: jade dragon
text:
what i have learned
only i know my heart
nobody gets to tell me what it feels

author: jade dragon
text:
for you...
i would dance

author: jade dragon
text:
it was never that i didn't trust you
what scared me was that i do
completely
& i didn't trust me...

author: jade dragon
text: ...don't you wanna save thus dirty little damsel...

author: jade dragon
text: i have run empty on the ability to express how much i need the only touch i have yet to feel from you

author: jade dragon
text: ...how do you want me...

author: jade dragon
text: drums like a heartbeat...

author: jade dragon
text:
it's that im dying inside
that i have been
& i didn't want to hurt anyone

author: jade dragon
text:
it's not that im different now
it's that i stopped hiding
the parts i knew nobody wanted to see

author: jade dragon
text: sway with me

author: jade dragon
text:
sometimes
what's needed
is headphones
& music blasting
in a dark fucking room

author: jade dragon
text:
she's upset
that i don't talk to her anymore
but i don't talk to her anymore
cuz what i have to say
upsets her...

author: jade dragon
text:
beg?
no
but i don't see myself ever not asking

author: jade dragon
text:
you
please
you

author: jade dragon
text:
the motivation
is that you
always
encouraged me
to embrace my own heart

author: jade dragon
text:
you
motivate me
like nobody else ever did

author: jade dragon
text:
whatever it might be
that you see in me
please fucking know
it likely never would've been
seen
without you
please, hear this fucking truth

author: jade dragon
text: i just know

author: jade dragon
text:
& i still want you
so fuckin much
no matter what i might be capable of
on my own
i know it's nothing compared to what it could be
with you...

author: jade dragon
text:
fuck
i love just seeing
your presence

author: jade dragon
text: could literally listen to you talk about absolutely anything all goddam day

author: jade dragon
text: my smile seems to live in you

author: jade dragon
text: it's fully possible to still care deeply for someone & still recognize the time has come to walk separate paths

author: jade dragon
text: if i could just reach out & pluck all the beautiful from all of this ugly...

author: jade dragon
text: anyone who expects you to be anything other than you can fuck every inch of all the way off

author: jade dragon
text:
nah, it's good, i'll just keep hiding in my cave, so my misery with the world doesn't make anyone uncomfortable
what's that?
hiding in my cave makes you uncomfortable too
well damn
lemme just work on not existing anymore then...

author: jade dragon
text: i need music

author: jade dragon
text: not many things hurt worse than no longer feeling comfortable in what was once a safe place...

author: jade dragon
text:
wish i could teleport
or just disappear
whatever would get me tf outta here

author: jade dragon
text:
all of me
craves
all
of
you...

author: jade dragon
text:
of all the beauty that exists
i think my favorite is a heart
that continues to beat
to bleed
to live
to love
despite so many reasons not to

author: jade dragon
text: i am both tormented & transcended by this insatiable need of you...

author: jade dragon
text: but...you should care...you really just fucking should...

author: jade dragon
text:
good day
bad day
happy mood
or sad
everything would be so much
better punctuated by
you...

author: jade dragon
text:
one of my favorite things about
this format
when it comes to writing
is all the inspiration to be found
in such beautifully strange souls

author: jade dragon
text: ...scene it the fuck up

author: jade dragon
text:
we'll try it...night 💋

https://t.co/C1GOmneiwB

author: jade dragon
text: k, fr now...

author: jade dragon
text: ...or not...

author: jade dragon
text: gonna try sleep, i think, even though it's been nothing but you all day...maybe i will dream instead of think

author: jade dragon
text: ...can you feel me...

author: jade dragon
text: some people are a waste of precious oxygen, honestly

author: jade dragon
text: all this art is not helping my hunger for you at all...

author: jade dragon
text: "don't say it's unholy, if i let you come hold me"

author: jade dragon
text:
literally just
the
thought

author: jade dragon
text: in need of lust or laughter...laughter it is, i suppose

author: jade dragon
text:
eyes
closed
sigh

author: jade dragon
text:
you speak to every deep
desire within
my soul

author: jade dragon
text: in need of that freezing fire tone you get that shivers my flesh

author: jade dragon
text:
to have such an exquisite easing
of all this rebellious
furious fire

author: jade dragon
text:
holy
fuck
i really
wish i was with you
right now

author: jade dragon
text:
i try to keep focus
but you are such a delicious
distraction...

author: jade dragon
text: all of this you has set me to flames

author: jade dragon
text:
take my hand
let's go start a bonfire
with every last vanity....

author: jade dragon
text:
i just
...really...
fucking want you

author: jade dragon
text:
i just want every part of your being
to touch every part of my body
the way the essence of you
has already had
every molecule of me

author: jade dragon
text:
sometimes
i don't react
cuz im afraid
to scare you off
with the intensity that is me

author: jade dragon
text:
impatiently waiting
with patient wanting
for you to claim everything me

author: jade dragon
text:
tasting
teasing
touching
feeling
falling
releasing
always im dreaming
...always of you...

author: jade dragon
text:
to feel you whisper in my ear
for you to touch
flesh rippling in response
& catching the breath
in my sighs

author: jade dragon
text:
letting feelings lead you isn't
wrong in itself
but your mind should co-pilot

author: jade dragon
text:
everything is you anymore
which i wouldn't mind at all
if we were together
anywhere
doing anything

author: jade dragon
text:
everything i do centers around caring about other people
whether i mean it to or not...

author: jade dragon
text:
a want that animates every molecule of my being
& there is no separation between you
& every other deep desire i have
because they all align with yours

you somehow encompass everything that has ever really mattered to me
& our paths crossed
& i cannot escape the divinity in that

author: jade dragon
text:
aching for a time that you tell me what you already know
that i am yours
that i always will be
that
somehow
i always have been...
